name: Aventura en Palabrilandia
description:
"Aventura en Palabrilandia" is a game based on words and is available only in Spanish. Translation would require redesigning story and gameplay elements.

-----------

Dos niños se disponen a hacer una gamberrada que les llevará a una gran aventura donde descubrirán los objetos más poderosos de Palabrilandia.

Descubre las peculiares reglas de Palabrilandia para conseguir destronar al malvado Rey Mapache.

--------

This game was made as an exercise in Game Design, following the same instructions that the students had to follow.

Game can be completed in 10-30 minutes.
